description.p: Get the date and time value NrOfSeconds seconds ahead of DateTime.

prototypes.prototype: AddSecondsToDateTime as T (DateTime as T, NrOfSeconds as N)

description.p: The number of seconds to add.
Returns the date and time value NrOfSeconds seconds ahead of DateTime.

discussion.p: The AddSecondsToDateTime function computes the date and time value NrOfSeconds seconds ahead of DateTime.

example.caption: AddSecondsToDateTime() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, AddSecondsToDateTime(Now(), 3600) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|10/10/2019 01:45:57 00 pm
